name: webappfind
author: Brett Zamir
description: Enables an experimental protocol system for allowing the user to supply local files for viewing and editing by web applications

scripts.build-pkg-installer: npm run build-pkg-native-apps && npm run build-pkg-installer-component && npm link
scripts.build-pkg-installer-all: npm run build-pkg-native-apps-all && npm run build-pkg-installer-component-all && npm link
scripts.installer: npm run build-installer && npm run run-install
scripts.pkg-installer: npm run build-pkg-installer && npm run run-pkg-install
scripts.installer-all: npm run build-installer-all && npm run run-install-all
scripts.pkg-installer-all: npm run build-pkg-installer-all && npm run run-pkg-install-all
scripts.copy: npm run copy-dialog-polyfill && npm run copy-polyfill && npm run copy-jquery && npm run copy-form-serialize && npm run copy-js-string-escape && npm run copy-load-stylesheets && npm run copy-multiple-select && npm run copy-jamilih && npm run copy-bootstrap
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run webext-lint
scripts.run: npm run eslint && npm run webext-run
scripts.addon: npm run eslint && npm run webext-build
scripts.installer-lint: npm run installer && npm run lint
scripts.installer-run: npm run installer && npm run run
scripts.installer-addon: npm run installer && npm run addon
scripts.installer-all-lint: npm run installer-all && npm run lint
scripts.installer-all-run: npm run installer-all && npm run run
scripts.installer-all-addon: npm run installer-all && npm run addon
scripts.pkg-installer-lint: npm run pkg-installer && npm run lint
scripts.pkg-installer-run: npm run pkg-installer && npm run run
scripts.pkg-installer-addon: npm run pkg-installer && npm run addon
scripts.pkg-installer-all-lint: npm run pkg-installer-all && npm run lint
scripts.pkg-installer-all-run: npm run pkg-installer-all && npm run run
scripts.pkg-installer-all-addon: npm run pkg-installer-all && npm run addon
